messages.subject: Fundraising and politics
messages.msgSnippet: I thought I d clear up my statement. When I said worst in OUR history, I meant on American soil. Obviousley the hideous act of dropping the bombs on Japan
messages.messageBody:
I thought I'd clear up my statement. When I said worst in OUR history, I
meant on American soil. Obviousley the hideous act of dropping the bombs on
Japan killed and injured many more.

I am patriotic and I have enjoyed the resurgence of patriotism. The US is
not perfect, just as no person is perfect. Politics get messy and we must
blend many different beliefs and priorities into a system for everyone.

I have a muslim friend from Pakistan and he tells me that the people there
believe we are like our TV. And even if we do not behave like out TV, we
watch it. To them it is no better than porn. To tell them that not all
americans watch TV, means nothing, the majority do. The problems we have
with the Al-Queda aren't going away thru kindness, in their hearts they
don't want our tainted money, they take it so their children can eat.

Oh well...I am unsure of my point. I think I am rambling. This beautiful
bunch of people here are not the group I want to debate. :) hehehe... I am
sure I'd lose for lack of eloquent words. :)

~Sheri
